content: this cute little lizard is an extremely easy knit and a great stash buster if you make a lot of them the lizard is knitted from head to tip of tail and legs are knitted seperately then eyes can be embroidered required skills are ~knitting in the round on double points ~kfb ~k2tog ~ssk ~i-cord optional the end product is quite adorable and is a great last minute gift for anyone and it is incredibly easy enjoy see here 1 for a lovely addition for toes provided by katielewth person 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/katielewth/little-lizard
